abstract: Hot Potato, a new social networking application, makes it easier to create conversations around locations and specific events, including concerts, sports and television shows.
snippet: Hot Potato, a new social networking application, makes it easier to create conversations around locations and specific events, including concerts, sports and television shows.
lead_paragraph: Twitter and Facebook offer incredible social networks for conversation about almost anything. But one feature they don’t offer is the ability to engage in conversations with a select group, either based on a location or a specific event.

headline.main: Hot Potato Offers Tool for Event-Based Chats
